orig_text:
BD: Broadcast Domain.  An EVI may be comprised of one BD
      (VLAN-based or VLAN Bundle services) or multiple BDs (VLAN-aware
      Bundle services).
correct_text:
BD: Bridge Domain.  An EVI may be comprised of one BD
      (VLAN-based or VLAN Bundle services) or multiple BDs (VLAN-aware
      Bundle services).
notes: broadcast domain is not comprised in any services (VLAN-based or VLAN Bundle service).

      Bundle services).
correct_text:
